mapper.select: SELECT AP_CODE, AP_OSCODE, AP_DATE, CG_TYPE, CG_NAME, DP_NAME, OF_NAME, OF_CODE FROM AP INNER JOIN CG ON AP.AP_CGTYPE = CG.CG_TYPE INNER JOIN DP ON AP.AP_FROMDPCODE = DP.DP_CODE AND AP.AP_FROMOFCODE = DP.DP_OFCODE INNER JOIN "OF" ON AP.AP_FROMOFCODE = "OF".OF_CODE WHERE AP_TODPCODE = #{ap_todpcode} AND AP_TOOFCODE = #{ap_toofcode} AND AP_ATCODE = 'OR'

SELECT AP_CODE, AP_OSCODE, AP_DATE, CG_TYPE, CG_NAME, DP_NAME, OF_NAME, OF_CODE, AP_ATCODE AS AT_CODE, AT_NAME FROM AP INNER JOIN CG ON AP.AP_CGTYPE = CG.CG_TYPE INNER JOIN DP ON AP.AP_FROMDPCODE = DP.DP_CODE AND AP.AP_FROMOFCODE = DP.DP_OFCODE INNER JOIN "OF" ON AP.AP_FROMOFCODE = "OF".OF_CODE INNER JOIN "AT" ON AP.AP_ATCODE = "AT".AT_CODE WHERE AP_TODPCODE = #{ap_todpcode} AND AP_TOOFCODE = #{ap_toofcode} AND AP_ATCODE = 'OA' OR AP_ATCODE='OF'
